[Storage Room] Lyria moves east to Storage Room.
[Storage Room] Lyria picks up Iron Shield. Equipped as armor (PDEF:3).
[Guard Barracks] Lyria moves west to Guard Barracks.
[Barracks Hall] Lyria moves north to Barracks Hall.
[Barracks Hall] Kael moves south to Barracks Hall. Sees: Lyria. No NPC named 'Kael' here.

[Barracks Hall] No NPC named 'Lyria' here. Finn says: ""Lyria! Good to see you. Kael and I just cleared the crypt above - found this ring from a bone mage. We're heading south toward the Rift. What...

[Barracks Hall] Kael says: ""Lyria! By the gods, it's good to see you alive in this cursed place! Finn and I have been cutting through undead and goblins. We're pushing south toward the Shadowfell"...

[Barracks Hall] Kael says: ""Rift! We need to press on together - three warriors are better than two! What dangers have you faced down here, Lyria? And which path do you think leads us closest to t...
[Central Corridor] Lyria moves north to Central Corridor. Finn moves north to Central Corridor. Sees: Lyria.
[Central Corridor] No NPC named 'Finn' here. No NPC named 'Lyria' here.

[Central Corridor] Lyria says: ""Finn, based on your scouting, south appears to be our best path toward the Shadowfell Rift. However, I suggest we proceed cautiously - shall we move south together ...

[Barracks Hall] Kael says: ""Comrades! We three warriors stand united against the darkness! Finn speaks truly - south leads deeper into the fortress toward our destiny. Let us charge forth together...

[Barracks Hall] Lyria says: ""I'm ready to proceed south toward the Rift. Kael and Finn, shall we advance together in formation?"" (nobody else is here)
